content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” rtl_reverse=”yes” content_placement=”middle” bg_type=”bg_color” bg_color_value=”#ededed”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″]

Contact Us for Donations

Donations can be sent to Idara Maarif ul Quran on the following address. Reciept is being issued as soon as the donation is recieved. Any amount sent for zakat, sadqa e jaria, or any other specifc purpose, should be mentioned. Idara maarif ul quran have separate system to save and ensure its purposeful and specified utilisation.
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

To deposited the amount directly to bank please contact

+92 333 3510538

[vc_empty_space]
Note : All the donations and charity of Idara Maarif ul Quran Karachi are exempted from income tax, by the Federal Board of Revenue of Government of Pakistan, Under the clause C of Act 36 (2) of Income Tax Ordinance 2001.
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kOXQEdefsts” align=”right” css_animation=”slideInLeft”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” gap=”10″ equal_height=”yes” rtl_reverse=”yes” content_placement=”middle” bg_type=”u_iframe” u_video_url=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T-H9PXBDDeI” video_opts=”loop,muted” video_poster=”id^15837|url^https://besttechglobal.com/projects/marif/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/Idara-Maarif-Docu-for-Mobile-025.jpg|caption^null|alt^null|title^Idara Maarif Docu for Mobile 025|description^null” enable_overlay=”enable_overlay_value” overlay_color=”#000000″ overlay_pattern=”01.png”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″]
(Sponsorship)

Scholarship Programs

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” rtl_reverse=”yes” content_placement=”top” gap=”10″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1612372368447{background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;border: 1px solid #ffffff !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]
Memorization of the Holy Quran
The teaching of the Qur’an in Ma’arif-ul-Quran is in its full swing. A large number of deserving students are studying in the Department of Hifz-e-Quran. Teaching the Quran is a great charity in which you may also co-operate with us, and draw the attention of your relatives to it.

Monthly expenses: Rs.3000 ………. Annual expenses: Rs.36,000

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1612372282396{background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;border: 1px solid #ffffff !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]
Huffaz School Program:
A unique & successful education system consisting of 5 years under the Matriculation board, in a purely religious environment, under the supervision of experienced teachers, a Hafiz student (Girl or Boy) is provided with school education.

Monthly expenses: Rs.3500 ….. Annual expenses: Rs.42,000

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” rtl_reverse=”yes” content_placement=”middle” bg_type=”bg_color” bg_color_value=”#ededed”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″]

Idara Ma'arif ul Quran

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” rtl_reverse=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]
Email:
info@almaarif.org
[vc_empty_space]
Address Main Campus:
Paradise Homes, Gulzar e Hijri,
Abul Hassan Isphani Road, Karachi
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]
Phone:
+92 21 34641033
[vc_empty_space]
Address Ayobe Goth Branch:
Jama Masjid Khadija-tul-Kubra,
Ayub Goth, Industrial Area, New Karachi
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/4″][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kOXQEdefsts” align=”right” css_animation=”slideInLeft”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” full_height=”yes” bg_type=”image” parallax_style=”vcpb-default” bg_image_new=”id^15712|url^https://besttechglobal.com/projects/marif/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/slider-2-background.jpg|caption^null|alt^null|title^slider 2 background|description^null” bg_image_repeat=”no-repeat” bg_img_attach=”fixed” enable_overlay=”enable_overlay_value” overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.65)” overlay_pattern=”transperant” overlay_pattern_attachment=”fixed”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]
To gain and spread the knowledge of Islam

Follow & Subscribe our Social Media
